scripts.dev:services: docker-compose up -d postgres timescale redis elasticsearch && concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:linkedin"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:web
scripts.build:services: concurrently "npm run build:auth" "npm run build:user" "npm run build:linkedin"
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.lint:services: concurrently "npm run lint:auth" "npm run lint:user" "npm run lint:linkedin"
scripts.type-check: concurrently "npm run type-check:auth" "npm run type-check:user" "npm run type-check:linkedin" "npm run type-check:web"
scripts.db:migrate: npm run db:migrate:main && npm run db:migrate:analytics
scripts.db:migrate:main: cd database && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:analytics: docker-compose exec timescale psql -U inergize_user -d inergize_analytics -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/02-timescale-init.sql
scripts.db:seed: cd database && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:reset:main && npm run db:reset:analytics
scripts.db:reset:main: cd database && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:reset:analytics: docker-compose exec timescale psql -U inergize_user -d inergize_analytics -c 'DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS analytics CASCADE;' && npm run db:migrate:analytics
scripts.setup: npm run setup:root && npm run setup:services && npm run setup:web && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:services: concurrently "npm run setup:auth" "npm run setup:user" "npm run setup:linkedin"
scripts.setup:db: npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.clean: npm run clean:services && npm run clean:web && npm run clean:root
scripts.clean:services: concurrently "npm run clean:auth" "npm run clean:user" "npm run clean:linkedin"
scripts.clean:auth: cd services/auth-service && rm -rf node_modules dist package-lock.json
scripts.clean:user: cd services/user-service && rm -rf node_modules dist package-lock.json
scripts.clean:linkedin: cd services/linkedin-service && rm -rf node_modules dist package-lock.json
scripts.postinstall: npm run setup:services && npm run setup:web
